item.title: Consistency
item.description:
In order to have a consistent data, we always have to synchronize multiple copies of the same data.

Weak Consistency

After a write, reads may or may not see it.

Eventual Consistency

After a write, reads eventually will see it.

Strong Consistency

After a write, reads will see it.

|| Weak Consistency | Eventual Consistency | Strong Consistency | || —- | —- | —- | | After a write | reads may or may not see it | reads eventually will see it | reads will see it | | Scenario | Real time cases such as VoIP, video chat | DNS and Email | Need Transactions system: file systems and RDBMSes |
